projects.title: Movie anniversaries web app
projects.description: A web app built with React displaying a calendar with upcoming movie anniversaries and movie information.

projects.title: Film production tools
projects.description: A selection of tools for use in the film industry, including a holiday pay calculator and framerate calculator. Built using React, React router, Sass, & Node.

projects.title: TFL oyster webscraper
projects.description: A webscraper built with phantomJS that returns a warning if there are any incomplete journeys linked to the account.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A calculator app with a long press clear button using vanilla JS.

projects.title: Webdev.email
projects.description: A weekly newsletter of web development links using Mailchimp and a html/css page.
